channel.title: BlazeScape Source
channel.description:
BlazeScape's Source, released.
Note: This is not Zack's (Blazefire) source. This is something done from scratch.
Base Source: iClarity v1.05 [b]Packaged:[/b] Yes
[u]Features[/u] - Custom Train Area in Slayer Tower and Crandor - Custom PK area in Fight Arena - Custom Skilling Area - Custom Woodcutting Guild - Castle Wars Starting Area - 60-75% Castle Wars - Working Duel Arena - Working Cooking (Burn formula needs some rework) - Working Fishing (Fish timers needs rework) - Working Fletching - Working Flax Spinning - Working Mining - Smithing Base (incomplete skill) - Working Woodcutting - Working Firemaking (Note: If you want no-clipping, you will have to do it yourself.) - Crafting Base - Working Runecrafting (With Multi-runes) - Working Barrows - Working Herblore - Working Slayer - Custom Warriors Guild Map - Custom Godwars Map - Actual Godwars Map - Actual Warriors Guild Map - Custom items include dylan's Greatswords, Arcanians weapon set, and more! - Updated Dharok's axe and abyssal whip models - Godswords and Godsword stance - Giant mole area - Magic Scrolls open up bank! - Potions - PvP - PvN - More that I can't think of.
[u]Media[/u] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/166cboi.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/rupifk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/f3z252.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/10yf0iw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/28o07p.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/335h280.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2rep3iu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2v9t28i.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2s61qf7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/jfu6c5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/t04184.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/124iwi8.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/ivd8o4.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/33bhjd1.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/v43whh.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/wrnoma.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/ndlf6s.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/213en9e.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ywff5z.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/efm3ch.png[/img]
[u]Commands[/u] Player: ::help ::players ::yell
Mod: ::empty ::bank ::banuser [username] ::mute [username] ::anal [username] ::tele [x coord] [y coord] ::xteleto [username] ::teletome [username]
Admin+: ::item [itemid] [amount] ::interface [interfaceid] ::frame126 [sendquestId/frame126Id] ::frame246 [frame246Id] ::lights ::ipban [username] ::unmute [username] ::abort [username] ::testingface [dialogueEmoteid] ::wall [face] ::door [face] ::xteleall ::xtelestaff ::height [level]
[b][Links][/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433008.0.html]Client[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?dwgy2nhtzej]Source[/url] [hr]
Credits: Me 50% Cocoa 50%
Enjoy
EDIT:
For those who get errors such is isMMapBlack(); add this to clientHandler.java
[code] public boolean justLoggedIn = false; public void isMMapBlack(boolean status) { outStream.createFrame(99); if(status == true) { outStream.writeByte(2); } else { outStream.writeByte(0); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } public void blackness(boolean shizz) { if(shizz == true && justLoggedIn == false) { isMMapBlack(true); showInterface(13583); sendMessage("Loading Objects..."); sendMessage("Please be patient."); } else if (shizz == true && justLoggedIn == false) { isMMapBlack(true); switch(Misc.random(3)) { case 0: showInterface(18679); break; case 1: showInterface(18221); break; case 2: showInterface(13390); break; case 3: showInterface(18681); break; } } else if (shizz == false && justLoggedIn == false) { isMMapBlack(false); closeInterface(); //sendMessage("Object Loading complete!"); } } public int loadedFloor1 = 0; public int loadedFloor2 = 0; public int loadedFloor0 = 0; public int loginscreen = 0;[/code]

item.title: BlazeScape Source
item.dc:creator: @extra_power7 extra_power7
item.description:
@extra_power7 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:1, topic:338263”]BlazeScape’s Source, released.
why can’t i play it it just gives me error connecting to server?!?! please respond i used to play this all the time

Note: This is not Zack’s (Blazefire) source. This is something done from scratch.

Base Source: iClarity v1.05
Packaged: Yes

Features

  • Custom Train Area in Slayer Tower and Crandor
  • Custom PK area in Fight Arena
  • Custom Skilling Area
  • Custom Woodcutting Guild
  • Castle Wars Starting Area
  • 60-75% Castle Wars
  • Working Duel Arena
  • Working Cooking (Burn formula needs some rework)
  • Working Fishing (Fish timers needs rework)
  • Working Fletching
  • Working Flax Spinning
  • Working Mining
  • Smithing Base (incomplete skill)
  • Working Woodcutting
  • Working Firemaking (Note: If you want no-clipping, you will have to do it yourself.)
  • Crafting Base
  • Working Runecrafting (With Multi-runes)
  • Working Barrows
  • Working Herblore
  • Working Slayer
  • Custom Warriors Guild Map
  • Custom Godwars Map
  • Actual Godwars Map
  • Actual Warriors Guild Map
  • Custom items include dylan’s Greatswords, Arcanians weapon set, and more!
  • Updated Dharok’s axe and abyssal whip models
  • Godswords and Godsword stance
  • Giant mole area
  • Magic Scrolls open up bank!
  • Potions
  • PvP
  • PvN
  • More that I can’t think of.

Media

Commands
Player:
::help
::players
::yell

Mod:
::empty
::bank
::banuser [username]
::mute [username]
::anal [username]
::tele [x coord] [y coord]
::xteleto [username]
::teletome [username]

Admin+:
::item [itemid] [amount]
::interface [interfaceid]
::frame126 [sendquestId/frame126Id]
::frame246 [frame246Id]
::lights
::ipban [username]
::unmute [username]
::abort [username]
::testingface [dialogueEmoteid]
::wall [face]
::door [face]
::xteleall
::xtelestaff
::height [level]

[Links]
Client
Source
[hr]

Credits:
Me 50%
Cocoa 50%

Enjoy

EDIT:

For those who get errors such is isMMapBlack(); add this to clientHandler.java

public boolean justLoggedIn = false; public void isMMapBlack(boolean status) { outStream.createFrame(99); if(status == true) { outStream.writeByte(2); } else { outStream.writeByte(0); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } public void blackness(boolean shizz) { if(shizz == true && justLoggedIn == false) { isMMapBlack(true); showInterface(13583); sendMessage("Loading Objects..."); sendMessage("Please be patient."); } else if (shizz == true && justLoggedIn == false) { isMMapBlack(true); switch(Misc.random(3)) { case 0: showInterface(18679); break; case 1: showInterface(18221); break; case 2: showInterface(13390); break; case 3: showInterface(18681); break; } } else if (shizz == false && justLoggedIn == false) { isMMapBlack(false); closeInterface(); //sendMessage("Object Loading complete!"); } } public int loadedFloor1 = 0; public int loadedFloor2 = 0; public int loadedFloor0 = 0; public int loginscreen = 0;[/quote]

  • Custom Train Area in Slayer Tower and Crandor

item.title: BlazeScape Source
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:44, topic:338263”][quote author=mopar fan link=topic=434654.msg3217023#msg3217023 date=1274759733]
Is this the same blazescape as the one off of www.blazescape.net? That was a couple years ago. =P It was epic win. Do you still have the black wings? ( If this is the same blazescape but re-released???)
[/quote]
This is not Zack’s BlazeScape.

This is Zac’s and Corey’s (me) BlazeScape. We just attempted to remake most of it while adding our own tastes.

Yes it has Black wings.[/quote]

KK, where did you get the original source from? I seem to remember a post for the download, but I cannot find it now…
I agree with nubster - nice =P

  • Reason I asked about the wings is because I would like to add that to my own server ( in progress…)

Read full topic
